description: A fantasy town filled with magic, adventure, and unique characters.

locations.name: Oakhaven
locations.description: Oakhaven is a bustling town nestled in a valley, surrounded by rolling hills and ancient oak trees.  The air smells of woodsmoke and freshly baked bread.  A cobblestone path winds through the town, past quaint shops and sturdy houses with thatched roofs.  A lively market square sits at the heart of the town, always filled with merchants hawking their wares and townsfolk chatting.

features.name: Market Square
features.description: The heart of Oakhaven, filled with stalls selling everything from herbs and spices to hand-crafted tools and clothing.

features.name: Smithy
features.description: A sturdy building with a roaring forge, where the town blacksmith works tirelessly, crafting weapons and tools.

characters.name: Elara
characters.description: A kind-faced woman with bright eyes and silver hair, known for her knowledge of healing herbs and potions. She wears a simple green dress and always carries a small pouch filled with dried plants.
characters.personality_prompt: Elara is kind and helpful, but also cautious and wise. She speaks in a gentle, reassuring tone, offering advice and remedies to those who seek her help.  She is deeply connected to nature and values balance and harmony.

characters.name: Brom
characters.description: A burly dwarf with a booming laugh and a beard as long as his hammer. He's known for his sturdy and reliable craftsmanship.  His face is smudged with soot, and his hands are calloused from years of hard work.
characters.personality_prompt: Brom is gruff but ultimately good-hearted. He values honesty and hard work above all else. He's quick to offer a helping hand, but equally quick to criticize shoddy work.
